text: Both my kids love swimming after joining Pacific Swim Team for more than 2 years, they are not afraid of water and can swim well in the pool. We would like to express our gratitude to the coaches from Pacific Swim Team for their dedication and professionalism! Thank you!

Coach Lawrence has been incredibly patient with my child over the past 4 months. Even when my child is reluctant or distracted, he stays calm and encouraging, while still keeping the class running smoothly with the other coaches. Coach Lydia also brings great energy and humour, making lessons fun for the kids. Really appreciate their dedication—highly recommended!

My kids have absolutely fantastic experiences with Pacific Swimming Team! The staff members are incredibly professional, friendly, providing clear instructions during my kids’ swimming class. Their expertise and patience help them improve their technique and confidence in the water. The swimming programs offered are diverse, catering to all age groups and skill levels. I highly recommend this place to anyone looking to learn, improve their swimming skills, or simply have a great time in the water! Big thanks to the staffs and instructors and good job!

My 5 year old daughter have been attending swimming lessons with pacific swim team for half a year. Her coach is coach Wan Zhen, and we are so pleased that she is able to swim so well now. Not only is she able to swim, she is also confident in water, and able to do several swim styles. Most importantly, she enjoys her swimming classes and always look forward to her weekly lessons.

School is flexible in allowing for rescheduling of missed class. Website is easy to navigate and the school admin team is responsive . My boy has overcome his fear of water and is confident now even in the deep pool. Overall a pleasant experience!  .
